attributes.action: Reduce car tax and fuel duty. Essential items for the average family.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring the old car tax system back, everyone pays the same, it was a fair deal for everybody. Reduce the ridiculous fuel duty charge, petrol in this country would not be so expensive if the government were not so greedy. Put cigarettes up to £10 a packet, the revenue can be found in non essential items.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+petrol&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=poverty&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
